title: Scam Alert
description: New people in the crypto space fall for scams all the time. Organizations, and individuals within the community receive threats of violence.

title: Automated Phishing/Scam Detection
description: Cardano giveaway scams are on the rise, with of users losing millions of USD via these scams. We need scalable ways of defending users.

title: Cardano Risk Profile Audit
description: Cardano stakepool operators face a variety of cybersecurity risks that they have not adequately prepared to defend against.

title: Automated Cyber Threat Intelligence
description: The Cardano ecosystem is producing massive volumes of data, we need a scalable framework to correlate this data into real-time threats.

title: Smart Contract Blacklisting
description: Malicious smart contracts threaten market trust throughout the network  Give people access to decentralized negative reputation signals.

title: CARDANO DLT-360 RISK RADAR
description: CARDANO and the DLT-space are still very new to the world, with expected and unexpected risks and opportunities arising along the road.

title: Cardano Threat Identification
description: As the Cardano network grows and ADA becomes more popular the threats from bad actors will also increase.

title: Crypto Regulation Surveillance
description: Government regulation can have a major effect on the effectiveness, innovation, value and even viability of cryptocurrency business models

title: DragonDefender Spam/Imposter Killer
description: Scam & Imposters are everywhere on YouTube. People are losing millions to these nasty people. It is clear Google needs help in this fight
